pages.title: Last Remarks
pages.text: This is the end of the guide! I hope you learned enough about the pack to not die immediately. There are many more mods and features that I didn't cover in this section so feel free to explore the guide book to find out about the other more niche features you might like!$(br)$(br)
$(imp)If you have any questions, feel free to ask in the discord server or on the modpack page. Good luck and have fun!$()
